Coils

Adding a New Coil

There are two ways to add a new Coil to the configuration:
1. Right-click on the Coils group in the System Configuration Tree and select Add Coil.
2. While the Coils group is selected, click the Add One button in the upper-right and corner.

Bulk Adding New Coils

There are two ways to add a new Coil to the configuration:
1. Right-click on the Coils group in the System Configuration Tree and select Bulk Add.
2. While the Coils group is selected, click the Add One button in the upper-right and corner.
Confirm the options in the dialog box that appears.

Configuring Coils

Name: The VeriStand channel name associated with the coil.
Address The address of the coil, zero-indexed. If your slave device lists the coil addresses as between 1-9999, you will need to subtract 1 from the value given. Changing the selector next to the Address indicator will toggle input between Decimal and Hexidecimal representations.
Read Select this option to get the value of the coil from the Modbus slave to the target.
Write Select this option to set the value of the coil on the Modbus slave with this channel's value.
Description This is for documentation purposes only, and does not affect the functionality.
